title: Fps drops
body:
When I play my game for the first 20 mins I get 120 fps
But after I die or the game gets past the 20 mins my fps drops to 30 for like 1 minute and then back up...
This is a huge problem for me because it killed me many times...
pls help

replies.body:
I found a possible root of my problem: texture errors.
It constantly has to generate dummy textures and it's overloading my graphics card.

It may be out of reach, since I already tried lower my settings to minimum and it's not working, for me to fix this.

Not sure how to post r3d logs, but I checked there.

There's a possibility that a game asset or driver is failing to render properly.  Baron does come up at 20.  :/  I'd suggest going over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up and get things running smoothly again.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QYiAOB4G,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-04T16:57:22.163+0000)
>
> There's a possibility that a game asset or driver is failing to render properly.  Baron does come up at 20.  :/  I'd suggest going over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up and get things running smoothly again.  Let me know if you have any questions!

It's not always at the 20 min mark,but mostly its random...
And yes I did go through the FPS issues guide but it didn't help

Sucks to hear, but thanks for trying!  In this case, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can help out and work with you individually to figure out what's going on.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
